title: Joe No, Pizza What? 3.5.20
itunes:title: Joe No, Pizza What? 3.5.20
description:
In episode 583, Jack and Miles are joined by activist and co-host of #GoodMuslimBadMuslim podcast Taz Ahmed to discuss the new IKEA and Pizza Hut collab, Super Tuesday, a global sick day, Twitter's new horrible idea, James Dolan waging a war on Spike Lee, Coronavirus helping the private jet business, how people are profiting off of coronavirus, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Pizza Hut and IKEA collaborate on an awesome pizza that we’ll never get to eat
  2. Live Forecast: Who Will Win Super Tuesday?
  3. Stopping the coronavirus requires health care access and paid sick leave. America's in trouble.
  4. Twitter Is Testing Tweets That Vanish After 24 Hours
  5. The Donald Trump of the NBA Wages War on Spike Lee, His Team’s Biggest Fan
  6. One way the wealthy hope to avoid coronavirus? Private jets
  7. CORONAVIRUS OUTBREAK CROWDS CLAMORING FOR PRIVATE JETS!!! ... Shelling Out $$$ For Virus-Free Skies
  8. Pray for coronavirus victims Comforter
  9. Coronavirus Merch Is Here, But Who's Buying It?
  10. ‘CoronaCoin’ cryptocurrency lets traders cash in on coronavirus outbreak
  11. There are already more than 65 songs with “coronavirus” in the title on Spotify
  12. Coronavirus Porn Is Going Viral on Pornhub
  13. Pretty Bitches: On Being Called Crazy, Angry, Bossy, Frumpy, Feisty, and All the Other Words That Are Used to Undermine Women
  14. WATCH: Air (Abstract Orchestra Remix) (feat. MF DOOM)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
